name: Spring Integration Disruptor
body:
### Welcome to Spring Integration Disruptor.
This project aims to bring the [LMAX Disruptor framwork](http://lmax-exchange.github.com/disruptor) to the [Spring Integration](http://www.springsource.org/spring-integration) ecosystem.

The planned features are the following:

* XML namespace support
* RingBuffer/Disruptor-backed MessageChannels, Adapters, Gateways
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
